bibl.title: Misthoprasia: the Lease-sale of Ships.

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.title: Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001
bibl.author: RATHBONE, Dominic

bibl.note: Considers in part. B.G.U. IV, 1157; P. Lond. III, 1164h (p. 163); P. Oxy. XVII, 2136; P. Köln III, 147; B.G.U. IV, 1179 descr. - Misthoprasia was the long-term lease of a boat in return for a share in the operating profits.
RATHBONE Dominic, Misthoprasia: the Lease-sale of Ships.
